Key: Why...?

All these memories... they're all still here?
That means the reset is becoming incomplete...

The powers of Eden are destabilizing...
Why is this happening?
At this rate, I won't be able offer my protection...
But I can't let that happen... no matter the cost...
(Who are you?)
This... is my wish...
(Huh?)
(Not this dream again...)
Everything is already decided...
Just go with the flow...
(Seriously, who are you?)
Shi...do... get up... Hey... Shido, wake up. It's morning.
Hm? R-Rinne?
Good morning, Shido.
Morning, Rinne...
What's wrong? Are you sick?

I'm okay, just a little groggy. I guess a lot
happened yesterday and I'm just feeling
a little tired.
Y-Yeah. A lot happened.

You're seriously wondering if I'm sick?
I'm really just recovering...
You sure looked like you were having fun.

What? Oh... sorry. I guess it's just been
a while since something like that happened.

Heh. You're right. Don't overdo it, okay?
You should probably take it easy and
just watch the Sports Day activities.
Ah. Maybe that's a good call.
Goodness, Shido... oh!
What is it?

I thought you'd get up sooner. I forgot
to turn off the fire on the pot. Haha!
Fire safety is no laughing matter!

Sorry, Shido. I need to go turn it off, but
don't fall back asleep, okay? Get up!
Rinne... Honestly, I'm more worried about you...
She can be a little ditzy sometimes...
I better hurry up before she starts nagging.
The pot was okay. Did you change y—
Uh...
Am I... supposed to scream now?

Hold on. Cool it. You don't need to make
fun of me. And you already screamed!
S-Sorry.
Was that you screaming, Rinne?
Onii-chan, did something funny happen?
S-Shido-san?!
Shido-kun... that's a big yikes.

Hold on. There's a perfectly reasonable
explanatation for this and... wait, are you
all coming in, too?!
Um... Shido, do you have a moment?
W-What is it, Rinne?!

I feel bad, but it won't be good if we can't
keep it underwraps so... sorry?
Huh?
Ouch...
S-Sorry. I didn't know I was so strong...
You don't need to apologize. It's my fault.

Onii-chan, did you want to show your body
to Rinne?

Kotori, come on. Can you not treat me like
I'm some hentai gentleman?

What? Why not? Hahaha, Onii-chan,
you are the ultimate hentai gentleman!
Don't call me a hentai gentleman!
Shido-kun, you have to admit that much of\nyour life resembles that of a hentai guy.
That's not fair!
Oh, really? What do you think, Yoshino?
I-I... I'm positive Shido-san... isn't!
Yoshino, you're the only one who believes in me!
Of course! Thank you.

All right... Good. Wow, Yoshino really is a good girl,
isn't she, Kotori?
...YAH!
What the?!
(An encyclopedia?! She could've taken my head off!)

Hey, Kotori. Isn't that a pretty dangerous thing
to throw around like that?
Haha, yeah, but it's totally fine. It's Onii-chan.
Now, now, Kotori. He hasn't fully recovered yet.

Okaaay... Sorry, Rinne. It was worth the face
Onii-chan made, though. It was so funny.
You know what...?

Why don't we have breakfast now that we're all here?
Come on, everyone.
You're right. The food's gonna get cold soon.
Oh! I thought I smelled something good. What is it?

Hehe, well I thought it might be too early for something
this heavy, but I made your favorite, Tohka... Hamburg!
Just like I promised.

I'm honestly not too confident that it tastes very good
though. Please, have some before it cools.

Wow, it's shaped pretty oddly! Whoa, look at all
the juice coming out of it. It looks great!
Ah. Rinne, that's amazing! Isn't that right, Yoshino?
I'm worried that... I may not be able to eat it all.
I'm so excited!

Hehe, eat it before it goes cold, Yoshino. You too,
Kotori. I made you both special plates.
(Rinne's cooking skills are divine!)
Oh! I'm going to eat it while it's still juicy!
Ah... time to dig in!
Hehe. It just makes me happy that you all like it.
Rinne, you're so considerate. I really think that's great.
H-Hey, Shido, quit it. You're making me blush!
Haha... Sorry.
(But... when did Rinne get so close with everyone? Huh...?)
Hm. What's the matter, Onii-chan?
Just... Um, Rinne? Where did you meet Tohka?
Huh? Well... at school I guess?
O-Oh... You guess, huh?
Yeah, on the day I transferred. Right, Tohka?

Hm? I think so. Rinne was so kind to me from the
moment we met. She's super nice!
O-Oh...

(I don’t get it. Something feels off. What was Rinne
doing then? I thought it was hard for Tohka to
blend into the class in the beginning...)
Shido, why are you bringing this up? Is everything okay?
What about Yoshino?
Huh?
Rinne, when did you and Yoshino meet?
Yoshino-chan? Um...
W-Where... did we meet again?

I think it was when you moved next to Shido's
apartment, Yoshino-chan. Remember? You dropped
by to say hi.
Huh? Oh... Yes! I-I think that's it!
Yeah! That time you made us food because\nyou said it was a housewarming tradition!
Is that so?

(Yoshino was living in the Spirit house? I don't know
why, but I keep feeling like something happened
to my memory...)
Wow, Shido-kun. Still feeling kinda hazy?
No, no, I'm fine. Sorry if I'm acting weird.
It's okay, but hurry and eat. You'll be late.
Okay.

(I still don't feel at ease about this, but I guess
there's no point in wasting time thinking about
it. I won't get the answers I want right now.)

Alright then, I'll be heading out soon. You guys
take care of the rest, okay?

Huh? You still have some time, don't you?
You barely touched your food.

Um... I have to get ready for morning practice.
Sorry!
Okay, Rinne! Have a nice day!
Okaaay. Bye!
Hm? Shido, what's the matter?

Rinne was in a hurry... I was wondering if
everything was okay with her.
Hm? I didn't really notice...

Oh... OH?! Shido, this hamburg steak is
extraordinary!

The aftertaste creeps up on you with a total umami
overload! It's so tasty! What do you think, Yoshino?
Y-Yes! It's very delicious.
Haha, I'm sure Rinne would like to have heard that.

Yeah. As always, Rinne's cooking is the best. Shido,
hurry up and eat! It'll be such a waste if you just
let it get cold.
O-Okay.
(Tohka really likes to eat...)

Oh! I-It's amazing! This is the best hamburg
steak ever!
Yeah! It really is, huh?

The man who marries Rinne will be so lucky.
He'll be eating meals like this every day.
S-Shido? Do you like girls who can cook?
Hm? What did you say, Tohka?
N-Nothing! I didn't say a thing!
O-Okay. Kotori, make sure to eat, okay?

You betcha! Ain't nobody gon' leave
a darn thing behind, I tell ya what!
W-What kind of accent are you even trying to do?
Forget it. Hurry up and eat or you'll be late.
Okay.
Oh! I-It's amazing! This is the best hamburg ever!
Yeah! It really is, huh?
Yeah! Wow, this makes the rice taste so good.
Uh, Shido... You should chew your food.

Oh come on, I know this. Hey, Kotori, you shouldn't
skip out on the rice. Eat that, too. It's great.

You betcha! Ain't nobody gon' leave
a darn thing behind, I tell ya what!
W-What kind of accent are you even trying to do?
Hehehe...

Oh, yeah. It's Sports Day, isn't it? I might play it safe
and just watch. Are you gonna go play tennis, Tohka?
Yep. Are you not feeling okay, Shido?
I'm okay, but I just recovered so I'm taking it easy.
Oh, alright. You do what you gotta do, I guess.
Rinne, you were going to play... lacrosse?

Yep, that's right! I'm on the lacrosse team.
I play so much I don't think I can lose!
Alright then, good luck!

Hehe, thanks. As long as everyone's having fun
out there, I'm happy.
Haha, such a Rinne answer.
Really? I thought everyone thought that way...

Now, now... anyway, this is a great opportunity
for you. Have fun out there.
Yeah, Rinne! Do your best!
Alright. Thanks, you two. I'll try my hardest.
Tohka? Why are you so dazed?
Ah, nothing. Just had something on my mind.

Oh. If you're worried about something, you
know you can talk to me, right?
Yeah... well, I'm going to school early!
O-Okay.
(She seemed a little off...)
Good morning. Time for homeroom.
It's finally time for Sports Day.

Testing is just around the corner, so make sure
to make the most of this and sweat the stress out.
Um... Teacher?
Itsuka-kun? What's up?

Sorry... I'm not feeling too hot.
Do you mind if I sit this one out?

Whoa, really? That's unfortunate, but sure.
Go rest up at the infirmary if you need to.

Thanks. I'll just be watching if that's okay.
If I get worse, I'll be sure to go rest.
Sure, just don't overdo it.
Thank you.
*cough*! *cough* *cough*! T-Teacher!
W-What's the matter, Tonomachi-kun?

M-My chronic tuberculosis seems to have come
out of remission... I'm relapsing! *cough* *cough*!

(H-Hey, wise guy. Chronic tuberculosis? Really?
That is one sorry excuse, even for―)

O-Oh no! That isn't good at all!
Tonomachi-kun, we need to go to the hospital right away!
W-Whaaaat?!

Medicine's come a long way. I'm sure we can find a cure!
I know it's an ancient disease, but if you don't deal
with it now, you'll regret it later!

W-Well... I don't think I'm relapsing anymore...
Yeah, I think it's going away...

Tonomachi-kun? You know, tuberculosis is becoming
a lot more common with the younger generations,
what with everyone refusing vaccinations now.

But don't worry! I'm with you! Let's get to the
hospital and finally get you the help you need!

Tama-chan?! I m-mean, Okamine-sensei...
do you really care about this student so much?!
Y-Yes?!
I think your special care for your students is healing me!
Huh?
Look! Wow! It's a miracle! I'm totally healed!

(Did he hit his head? He must be having mental issues.
To feel fine after a disease like that... it's obvious!)

Look! Thanks to you, I have courage again!
Yah! Yah! Yah!
B-But...
I'm okay. I promise I'll visit the hospital later.

It's all thanks to you that my condition has healed.
If it's okay with you though, I'd like to play it safe
today and just be an observer.
O-Okay... sure. Just make sure to get a check-up soon.
Okay, okay!

Okay, everyone, we decided on which sports
we'll be playing, so make sure to check what
you're supposed to be playing today.
(That actually worked? Oh, Tama-chan...)
(Tonomachi just forced her to believe him. I feel awful.)

Hey, Itsuka! Did you see the magic old Tonomachi
just performed?! I won't let you be the only one
to play hooky today.

Some nerve. Don't think we're doing the same thing
here. Besides, if it was anyone else besides Tama-chan,
you would've never been able to pull that off.

What's your problem, Itsuka? Are you jealous
of my sweet, sweet skills?

You really should think about going to the hospital.
You probably should get your head checked out.

Oh, come on. Don't do me like that. Here, I'll let
you even use my excuse next time you're trying
to get out of doing something. It's on the house!

Why are you like this? Who on earth would feel
comfortable using an excuse like that?!

HEYYY! *cough* *cough*! *groan*! *cough* *cough*
I said *couuugh* and *wheeze*!
What...?
Y-Yatogami-san?! W-What is it?!

O-Oh no! Tonomachi... I must have caught his terrible
tuberculosis disease! Can I sit out, too? I don't feel well.
H-Hey, Tohka! You should play!
Grr! But I want to watch with you, Shido!

Uh... Y-Yatogami-san? Are you really okay?
I mean, with all the coughing and everything...
Hm? Y-Yeah! Huh?!
C-*cough* *cough*! *cough* *cough*! How's that?
Oh. This isn't good at all.
Tohka-chan, you were fine this morning.
Well, um... *cough*
Don't play dumb.
*Grunt*

Tohka, don't put the teacher through all this.
You said you were looking forward to tennis too,
since it was your first time and all...
Well... that's true, but...
Hm? What's the matter, Tohka-chan?
Why can't I be the one sitting with Shido?!
AH!
I am not happy with what I just heard.
Origami Tobiichi?!

A person who cannot even fulfill a task they were
given has no right to spend time with Shido.
W-What are you talking about?

Only winners can spend time with Shido.
It's Sports Day, after all.
Excuse me?
Oh... I get it. That sounds fun!
What?!

If you choose to forego this challenge, then the one
who will be spending time with Shido is... me.

What?! Okay then... I will attempt this... tennis...
and try my very best to win.

No need to try your best.
We know who will be victorious in the end.

Shut up! Just shut up! I'm gonna participate
in Sports Day, do my best, and be the winner!
As you wish. I won't lose.
Grrr... I won't be the one to lose...
Hehe. Seems like we managed to get through this.

Easy for you to say, isn't it? And when did I become
the prize? Nobody even asked me how I felt about that!
It's for Tohka-chan. Give it up.
Fine...

Tohka, just try your best at tennis, okay? I'm not sure
if I'll make it in time, but I'll try to see your match!
Right! Wait, really?
Yes, really.
I'll be waiting for you!

I'm not sure I'll make it to yours either, Origami,
but good luck with volleyball! Make our class proud,
okay?
Anything you want, Shido.
And thanks for stopping Tohka...

No need for that. If we let her get in the way of
homeroom any longer, it will affect today's progress.
I-I see...
(Anyways, I'm glad Tohka didn't go rogue...)
*sigh*...

Feeling tired after being fought over by all of these
cute girls, Mr. Nice Guy? Give me a break!

The only reason any of this happened is because
you pretended to have tuberculosis today!

You're right. To think Tohka-chan would use the ol'
Tonomachi Magic... I've gotta say, I'm impressed.
Can you please stop being a bad influence on Tohka?
(I'm seriously gonna kick your ass if you keep it up.)
Uh... Itsuka-kun?
Y-Yes?!

So... you and Tonomachi-kun will be the ones
sitting out, right?
Yes! That's right. Thank you!

(Your magic totally wore off and you're acting
way too healthy for someone who just had TB.)
O-Okay. Um... you two were on the soccer team, right?
Y-Yes...

I'll contact the sports committee and get replacements
for you. Please adjust the team rosters with the
new members.
I-I'm so sorry for all of this.

It's totally fine. You two just focus on your health.
If you feel better, just make sure to cheer everyone on.
Okay! Leave it to me!
O-Okay...
Class 2-4! Let's do our best and get this victory!
Yeah! Leave it to me!
(Phew, Tohka finally is pumped.)
Hehe... Tohka-chan we can't lose now can we?

Yeah, but I'm not losing to you either, Rinne!
I'm giving it my all, so you better be, too!
U-Um... I'll do my best!
Okay!

(Rinne's playing lacrosse... Origami, volleyball...
Tohka's in tennis... hm. I hope I'll be able to see
everyone play, but that might be a challenge.)

What?! Um... I'll try my best. I mean, I am on the
lacrosse team as it is... and that's the sport I'm
playing today...
Gotcha.

(Oh, right. Rinne was in lacrosse, wasn't she?
I want to go cheer for everyone, but I don't think
I'll be able to go to every match.)
So, Shido...
Huh? What is it?
What do I do... in this tennis thing...?
Oh...
Alright, Itsuka! Let's go feast our eyes on paradise!

No, no. We need to head to the soccer field
because there are people who have to suffer
on account of us sitting out.

You kidding me, bro? What about the girls?!
We gotta get a good look at them!

No, we really don't. All we need to do
is make sure we cheer them on.

Oh, don't be such a dweeb, Itsuka.
Okay, who do you want to go watch?

(*sigh* He's always like this.
Anyway, who should I go cheer for?)
Cheer for Tohka
Cheer for Origami
Cheer for Rinne
